summary: DURING SERVICE HAD TRANSMITION OIL & FILTER CHANGED AT 69,000 MILES.  NO SILVER SPARKLES IN OLD OIL NOTED.  AT 86,000 COMPLEAT TRANS FAILURE.  WHEN PAN REMOVED FROM TRANS. "CHUNKS" OF METAL NOTICED IN OIL!!!!! WARRANTY DID NOT COVER $3,700 TO REPLACE TRANS. REGARDLESS OF TEMP, TRANS SHIFTS WHEN IT WANTS TO AND WILL STALL ENGINE IN A MINUTE FOR NO REASON.
